scripts.pack_sdk: cd ../sdk && yarn pack && mv package.tgz ../indexer/sdk.tgz && cd ../indexer
scripts.pack_bridge: cd ../sdk-bridge && yarn pack && mv package.tgz ../indexer/bridge.tgz && cd ../indexer
scripts.pack_govern: cd ../sdk-govern && yarn pack && mv package.tgz ../indexer/govern.tgz && cd ../indexer
scripts.pack_all: npm run pack_sdk && npm run pack_bridge && npm run pack_govern
scripts.start: npm run migrate && npm run any
scripts.release-docker: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --push -t gcr.io/nomad-xyz/nomad-indexer:sha-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.get_sdk: cd ../../typescript/nomad-sdk && npm i && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../../tools/indexer && mv ../../typescript/nomad-sdk/nomad-xyz-sdk-1.3.5.tgz .
